name: Truthseeker (M A T)
description:
"365 were the days I spent hiding from them...."

Explore the planet in this short narrative adventure game. Collect runes and investigate more to figure out what happened and where you are. But be careful you haven't been on the surface for a long time, something could change.

HOW TO PLAY

Keyboard and Mouse.
WASD: Movement
Mouse: Look around.
Shift: Active Sprint/Walk.
Left click: Action.
